Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win7 x64,Win8 x64,Win10 x64,Win11 x64,Win12 x64
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: AdBlocker now merges updates with your custom lists, no more exports needed. Right-click to block instantly. TurboDown 2.0 is faster and smoother. Tabs now move top or bottom. Extension folder fixed. Smarter, faster, and cleaner... your browser perfected!
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size and Windows 7 x64 and Beyond...

English.Char_Desc_45: Dedicated gamer and streaming web browser!
English.Char_Desc_80: Dedicated gamer and streaming web browser with ultra-low latency!
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer is a dedicated gamer and streaming browser with ultra-low latency and super-fast browsing speed! Because it's based on Windows's WIN32 API, it has the highest level of performance with direct access to system hardware.
English.Char_Desc_450:
SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer is a dedicated gamer and streaming browser with ultra-low latency and super-fast browsing speed! Because it's based on Windows's WIN32 API, it has the highest level of performance with direct access to system hardware.
NetSurfer E-Gamer runs on a web engine also known as the WebView2 runtime control. By using the WebView2 control in standalone mode, we are able to provide you with the fastest surfing speed ever!
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Introducing the SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer browser, a revolutionary tool designed to elevate your online gaming experience while seamlessly integrating streaming entertainment. Engineered with gamers and streaming entertainment in mind, this browser combines unparalleled speed, exceptional performance, and a suite of specialized features to optimize every aspect of your browsing sessions.
SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer browser not only enhances gameplay with ultra-low latency and maximum responsiveness but also integrates effortlessly with popular streaming platforms and international news and sports websites. Enjoy uninterrupted streaming of your favorite movies, shows, and live broadcasts without compromising on browsing performance. Its lightweight design ensures smooth operation, even on less powerful devices, making it ideal for both intense gaming sessions and relaxed entertainment breaks.
SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer is based on Microsoft's WIN32 API. Quote from Microsoft's website: "...The Win32 API platform is the choice for applications that need the highest level of performance and direct access to system hardware..."
SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer comes bundled with PCDrop, a file transfer app for syncing files with your Android smartphone directly from your PC desktop.
Prioritizing security and privacy, SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer browser protects your data and shields you against online threats, while its intuitive interface and customizable settings cater to all types of online browsing. Personalize your gaming environment, manage your streaming preferences, and stay connected with communities, all within a single, streamlined secure platform.
Join the future of online gaming and entertainment with SSuite NetSurfer E-Gamer browser -- where speed, precision, and the joy of streaming converge for an unparalleled digital experience on the world wide web.
No Java or DotNet required. Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time...
